name: Sector: Invasion
overview: Sector: Invasion is a sci-fi shooting game which combines features of the arcade games Space Invaders and Arkanoid. The levels are made up of enemy space ships and barriers constructs of layers of several types of destructible cells. These ships are indestructible, so the main goal is to destroying the necessary cells on the screen just like in Arkanoid - with the exception of not using a ball for that purpose, but firepower.
